articles.summary: Accra ‚Äî Three illegal miners have died of asphyxiation after being trapped in a tunnel in Ghana. The three men were part of a group of 'galamseyers' (a term that refers both to the illegal mining of gold and other minerals and to those who practice it) who had secretly entered the inactive section of the Prestea mining concession, managed by the company Heath Goldfields Ltd., in the western region of the country.
